title: Vod
author: Vod
created_time: November 14, 2023, 04:07:00 AMLast edit: February 21, 2024, 03:14:34 AM by Vod
content: Quote from: OgNasty on November 14, 2023, 12:53:31 AMI actually have been meaning to remove my negative trust rating for him [Vod] because I just plain don‚Äôt care about him anymore at all. 1) You've claimed to not care about me for over six years now. ¬† What changed recently to make it so "plain"?2) You claimed I extorted you for $5,000,000, am constantly harassing you offline, and have abused the trust system of a forum and people you love and trust. ¬† Do those things no longer bother you, or did they never happen?3) My lawyers haven't contact you or Theymos yet. ¬† What/who is forcing you to do this?

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on November 14, 2023, 04:18:42 AMNobody cares dude. Get a life. Someone cares.¬† Was it you or Theymos that contacted the federal agent in Arizona?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 03:58:31 PMQuote from: OgNasty on November 14, 2023, 04:18:42 AMNobody cares dude. Get a life. Someone cares.¬† Was it you or Theymos that contacted the federal agent in Arizona? Not me. If you think I‚Äôve spent two seconds caring about you outside of calling you a mentally ill idiot on these forums then you are mistaken.¬† Stop trying to make it sound like anyone cares about you. Most likely you contacted the agency and they told you to fuck off with your insanity like everyone else.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on November 14, 2023, 05:03:43 PMNot me. So you're saying Theymos tried to shut me up?I think you're being dishonest, as per your MO.¬† ¬†Did you also call the Alberta Stroke center last year to warn them I was going to stroke out again, or did someone else tell you what my doctors are saying about me?¬† You've been contacting my family members for years.¬† The only reason you stopped and suggested removing your negative trust is because you feel the noose.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Just to be completely clear on the subject for anyone who might be unaware that you are a habitual liar. I‚Äôve never contacted anyone about you ever, not family, not police, not hospitals, nobody. I don‚Äôt care about you at all. You are a mentally ill wacko who is obsessed with me for some unknown reason. I have no fear of you doing anything to me whatsoever and to be completely honest I thought you were dead.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Vod, I have put up with your nonsense for far too long. Much longer than any reasonable person would expect me to. Still, you continue to spread lies about me for some strange reason. So here‚Äôs my offer to you. Since you clearly misunderstand so many things, you can ask me all the questions you want in a single response to this post. I will answer your questions honestly and then I am hitting the ignore button on your account to never think about you ever again. I‚Äôd recommend you take advantage of this offer as I will be hitting ignore and forgetting about you either way.

comments.author: Vod

As long as you lie in your trust and scam innocents, and Theymos supports it, I will continue to call you out. ¬† By ignoring me, you'll just make my job easier, so thanks.Criminals don't ¬†get to choose when they are arrested, bozo, and I know I'll be living in your head for years yet. ¬†- Did you have any kind of deal with pirate and his ponzi?- How many coins did you pay out of your emergency fund? (this is a number)- You claimed I extorted you for $5,000,000, am constantly harassing you offline, and have abused the trust system of a forum and people you love and trust.¬† ¬†Do those things no longer bother you, or did they never happen?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 16, 2023, 12:33:24 AM- Did you have any kind of deal with pirate and his ponzi?No. I was a victim myself who lost somewhere around 50 BTC when pirate closed up shop. All messages between me and pirate were also subject to subpoena, so this is a confirmed fact by law enforcement. That‚Äôs why nothing happened to me while others went to jail. Quote from: Vod on November 16, 2023, 12:33:24 AM- How many coins did you pay out of your emergency fund? (this is a number)All of them. Luckily, near the end of pirate‚Äôs run there were quite a few people offering better deals than myself, so everyone withdrew their deposits from my program before the collapse to deposit with other members who offered better deals. 2 people left their profits in knowing they would be covered by the ‚Äúemergency fund‚Äù (your words), which they were. That is why you can‚Äôt find a victim from my deposit program. There are none. Quote from: Vod on November 16, 2023, 12:33:24 AM- You claimed I extorted you for $5,000,000, am constantly harassing you offline, and have abused the trust system of a forum and people you love and trust. ¬† Do those things no longer bother you, or did they never happen?The extortion message you sent me is available for anyone to read here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5352637.0People can decide for themselves if they think that is a (pathetic) extortion attempt or not. As for the trust abuse, anyone can see that for themselves as well. You claim I‚Äôm gravitate (total nonsense) you claim I‚Äôm MrDove (that was a team of people I actually met in real life), you claim I stole from the forum (my title is Donator) which is not true or theymos wouldn‚Äôt trust me like he distrusts you. Not to mention all the other nonsense ratings you‚Äôve left me which I believe amount to libel and would get you in hot water if I felt like it mattered enough to care. As far as the current state of the DT network of course it bothers me. You can see in my trust settings that I don‚Äôt trust DT and haven‚Äôt for years, primarily because there are members there who trust you, even after the constant provable lies, harassment, and extortion attempts.I‚Äôve answered all your questions. I‚Äôm now hitting the ignore button to the delight of everyone on these forums.
